description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国四川省下辖的地级市，位于四川省北部，是全省第二大城市、中国重要的国防科研和电子工业生产基地。
description.en: A prefecture-level city under the jurisdiction of Sichuan Province, People's Republic of China, located in the northern part of Sichuan. It is the second-largest city in the province and an important national defense research and electronics industry base in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共绵阳市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Party Secretary of Mianyang.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任绵阳市人大常委会主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Director of the Standing Committee of the Mianyang Municipal People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任绵阳市市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Mayor of Mianyang.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任绵阳市政协主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Chairman of the Mianyang CPPCC.

nodes.id: 中国共产党绵阳市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党绵阳市委员会
en: Mianyang Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在绵阳市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Mianyang City.

description.zh-cn: 绵阳市的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of Mianyang City.

nodes.id: 绵阳市人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 绵阳市人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the Mianyang Municipal People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 绵阳市人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The standing body of the Mianyang Municipal People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议绵阳市委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议绵阳市委员会
en: Mianyang Municipal Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议在绵阳市的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference in Mianyang City.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国自1964年起在中国中西部地区的13个省、自治区进行的一场以战备为指导思想的大规模国防、科技、工业和交通基本设施建设。
description.en: A large-scale national defense, technology, industry, and transportation infrastructure construction initiative guided by war preparedness, carried out by the People's Republic of China in 13 provinces and autonomous regions in central and western China starting from 1964.

description.zh-cn: 中国唯一的核武器研制生产单位，主体坐落于四川绵阳。
description.en: China's sole nuclear weapons research, development, and production unit, with its main body located in Mianyang, Sichuan.

description.zh-cn: 2008年5月12日发生于中国四川省的特大地震，绵阳市是重灾区之一。
description.en: A major earthquake that occurred in Sichuan Province, China on May 12, 2008. Mianyang was one of the hardest-hit areas.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关，即中央人民政府。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China, i.e., the Central People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝开国皇帝刘邦。
description.en: Liu Bang, the founding emperor of the Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期蜀汉开国皇帝。
description.en: Founding emperor of the state of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年益州牧。
description.en: Governor of Yi Province during the late Eastern Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期蜀汉大司马。
description.en: Grand Marshal of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期蜀汉将领，诸葛亮嗣子。
description.en: A general of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period, adopted son of Zhuge Liang.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期蜀汉丞相。
description.en: Chancellor of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期曹魏将领。
description.en: A general of Cao Wei during the Three Kingdoms period.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国在1937年至1945年间抵抗大日本帝国侵略的战争。
description.en: The war fought by the Republic of China against the invasion of the Empire of Japan from 1937 to 1945.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国沈阳市的著名大学，抗日战争期间曾内迁至四川三台。
description.en: A renowned university located in Shenyang, China, which relocated to Santai, Sichuan during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国四川省绵阳市下辖县。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Mianyang City, Sichuan Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的主要武装力量。
description.en: The principal military force of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国省级行政区。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative division of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国四川省绵阳市下辖市辖区，绵阳市政府所在地。
description.en: A municipal district under the jurisdiction of Mianyang City, Sichuan Province, People's Republic of China, and the seat of the Mianyang Municipal Government.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国四川省绵阳市下辖市辖区。
description.en: A municipal district under the jurisdiction of Mianyang City, Sichuan Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国四川省绵阳市下辖市辖区。
description.en: A municipal district under the jurisdiction of Mianyang City, Sichuan Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国四川省绵阳市代管的县级市。
description.en: A county-level city administered by Mianyang City, Sichuan Province, People's Republic of China.

en: Southwest University of Science and Technology

description.zh-cn: 位于四川省绵阳市的综合性大学。
description.en: A comprehensive university located in Mianyang, Sichuan Province.

description.zh-cn: 总部位于四川绵阳的中国家电制造商。
description.en: A Chinese home appliance manufacturer based in Mianyang, Sichuan.

description.zh-cn: 绵阳市是四川省下辖的地级市。
description.en: Mianyang is a prefecture-level city under the jurisdiction of Sichuan Province.

relationships.target: 中国共产党绵阳市委员会

description.zh-cn: 左永祥自2024年12月起担任中共绵阳市委书记。
description.en: Zuo Yongxiang has served as the Secretary of the Mianyang Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China since December 2024.

relationships.target: 绵阳市人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 唐浪生自2025年1月起担任绵阳市人大常委会主任。
description.en: Tang Langsheng has served as the Director of the Standing Committee of the Mianyang Municipal People's Congress since January 2025.

description.zh-cn: 李云自2022年1月起担任绵阳市市长。
description.en: Li Yun has served as the Mayor of Mianyang since January 2022.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议绵阳市委员会

description.zh-cn: 李亚莲自2020年1月起担任绵阳市政协主席。
description.en: Li Yalian has served as the Chairman of the Mianyang CPPCC since January 2020.

description.zh-cn: 汉高祖于公元前201年始置涪县，为绵阳建县之始。
description.en: Emperor Gaozu of Han established Fuxian County in 201 BC, marking the beginning of Mianyang's establishment as a county.

description.zh-cn: 211年，刘备入川，益州牧刘璋在涪县（今绵阳市）富乐山为其接风。
description.en: In 211, when Liu Bei entered Sichuan, Liu Zhang, the Governor of Yi Province, hosted a reception for him at Fule Mountain in Fuxian County (modern-day Mianyang).

description.zh-cn: 诸葛瞻是诸葛亮的嗣子。
description.en: Zhuge Zhan was the adopted son of Zhuge Liang.

description.zh-cn: 邓艾偷渡阴平后，诸葛瞻为国携子战死于绵阳，未能成功阻击邓艾军队。
description.en: After Deng Ai secretly crossed Yinping, Zhuge Zhan fought and died with his son for their country in Mianyang, failing to halt Deng Ai's army.

description.zh-cn: 中国抗日战争爆发后，东北大学内迁至四川省三台县。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Second Sino-Japanese War, Northeastern University relocated to Santai County, Sichuan Province.

description.zh-cn: 1949年12月21日，中国人民解放军进驻绵阳，标志着绵阳解放。
description.en: On December 21, 1949, the Chinese People's Liberation Army entered Mianyang, marking its liberation.

description.zh-cn: 从1965年起，绵阳地区被确定为三线建设的重要基地之一，建设了一大批国家级重点科研机构，成为国防科研和电子工业生产基地。
description.en: Starting from 1965, the Mianyang area was designated as one of the important bases for the Third Front construction, where a large number of national key scientific research institutions were established, making it a base for national defense research and the electronics industry.

description.zh-cn: 作为“三线建设”的一部分，中国工程物理研究院在绵阳地区布点建设。
description.en: As part of the 'Third Front' construction, the China Academy of Engineering Physics was established in the Mianyang area.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 1985年2月，经中华人民共和国国务院批准，建立地级绵阳市。2001年7月，再次批准建设绵阳科技城。
description.en: In February 1985, with the approval of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, the prefecture-level city of Mianyang was established. In July 2001, it was again approved to build the Mianyang Science and Technology City.

description.zh-cn: 在2008年汶川大地震中，绵阳市为重灾区，造成重大人员伤亡和财产损失。
description.en: In the 2008 Wenchuan earthquake, Mianyang was a heavily affected area, suffering significant casualties and property damage.

description.zh-cn: 涪城区是绵阳市下辖的市辖区。
description.en: Fucheng District is a municipal district under the jurisdiction of Mianyang City.

description.zh-cn: 游仙区是绵阳市下辖的市辖区。
description.en: Youxian District is a municipal district under the jurisdiction of Mianyang City.

description.zh-cn: 安州区是绵阳市下辖的市辖区。
description.en: Anzhou District is a municipal district under the jurisdiction of Mianyang City.

description.zh-cn: 江油市是绵阳市代管的县级市。
description.en: Jiangyou is a county-level city administered by Mianyang City.

description.zh-cn: 三台县是绵阳市下辖的县。
description.en: Santai County is a county under the jurisdiction of Mianyang City.

description.zh-cn: 西南科技大学是位于绵阳市的一所主要高等教育机构。
description.en: Southwest University of Science and Technology is a major higher education institution located in Mianyang.

description.zh-cn: 长虹集团是总部位于绵阳市的大型企业，对当地经济有重要影响。
description.en: Changhong Group is a large enterprise headquartered in Mianyang, with significant influence on the local economy.
